name: Hamburger Harvest
description:
Hamburger Harvest

A game about assembling hamburgers! Do it quick, and do it according to the recipe. Made for the Ludum Dare game jam 52.

Like the game?

Vote for this game in the Ludm Dare game jam. See the gamejam submission.

Controls

  • Arrow keys
  • Mouse in menus

How to play

Follow the recipe and stack the burger correctly.
